description: Details required for Condition 24 (Travel Plan) of planning permission 19/02455/FUL (Demolition of the existing riding school buildings and the erection of 2x Blocks to accommodate 52 No. residential apartments, with associated car parking and landscaping and provision of electricity substation)
decision_conditions: Five years after the development is more than 80% occupied a Monitoring Report shall have been submitted to the local planning authority in writing for approval, setting out how the Travel Plan has achieved a 10-percentage point increase in sustainable travel modes. If the target of 10 percentage point increase has not been achieved a revised Travel Plan shall be submitted to and approved in writing to the local planning planing authority.Reason: To ensure the successful implementation of the submitted Travel Plan.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
